mainEntity.name: How can I get admission to Amity University Noida?

acceptedAnswer.text: Amity University's admission process includes six important steps from the availability of the application form to receiving the admission offer letter. Candidates seeking admission to Amity Noida must visit the official website of the University to register themselves. The step-wise Amity University Noida admission process 2025 is given below: Amity University Application Process 2025: Amity Noida's application process is the same for all courses and students can fill out the form online from the official website. If candidates wish to apply for more than one programme, they need to fill out a separate form for each course by paying an application fee of INR 1,500 each. If you are a new user, click on 'Apply Fresh' to register yourself. In case, you have already registered yourself, you can complete your application by clicking on 'Continue Partially Filled Form'. Selection of the Program & Filling out the Application Form: In order to choose the right course, Amity Noida has developed a Career Aptitude Test, which will help the aspirants in choosing a course of their choice. After selecting a course, candidates can start filling out the application form. Fill out the application form with all the mandatory details and upload all the required documents to complete the application process. Availability of Information on the Admission Microsite: In the next step, aspirants can get access to the Amity University admission microsite to receive all kinds of admission-related updates. Candidates can log in to the admission microsite by using their form no and password. Selection Process: Amity Noida's selection process is based on the performance of candidates in the Personal Interview round, which is mandatory to qualify to get admission to every course. Admission Offer Letter: The information with respect to selection will be communicated on the admission microsite as well as via Email and SMS. Selected candidates will get an admission letter along with important information such as semester fee, classes commencement date, time, venue of the course, allotment of a hostel (If applied), scholarship (If any) and the list of documents required at the time of joining.
